name: 2D Platformer Final Project (Gray-Ant)
description:
W. Grant Hayward's 2D Platformer Final

Changes Made:

- Completely changed the layout for Level 2 and made it more difficult than level 1 

- Added Level 3 and increased difficulty from Levels 1 and 2

- Added more details to the levels and main menu. Added button for level 3 but couldn't figure out how to move it above the main menu button.
